MainApp Context Processors

This module provides a set of context processors for the main app.

mainapp.context_processors.get_profile_pic(request)

Get the profile picture for the current user

Parameters:

request – HttpRequest

mainapp.context_processors.get_user_notifications(request)

Get all unread notifications for the current user

Parameters:

request – HttpRequest
